body: Will you be able to build in the void on all of the new CTW maps? I know on OCN you are not allowed to build in the void during a CTW game, so I'm curious to see if Avicus will follow this same rule.
body_tagged: Will you be able to build in the void on all of the new CTW maps? I know on OCN you are not allowed to build in the void during a CTW game, so I'm curious to see if Avicus will follow this same rule.
title: Question about CTW.

replies.body:
I don't see why not :P After all, you need to bridge in Rendezvous II, Justice III, Arizona, Nucleus, Crossfire and Aquirion.

Answer is most likely "yes".
replies.body_tagged:
I don't see why not :P After all, you need to bridge in Rendezvous II, Justice III, Arizona, Nucleus, Crossfire and Aquirion.

Answer is most likely "yes".

replies.body: Yes, you will be able to build in the void.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, you will be able to build in the void.

replies.body:
You guys are misinterrupting my question. Yes, obviously you will be able to build in the void areas where you need bridge :P

My question is, will you be able to build on the side of the map. I don't think that you shohld be allowed to. This is how it is played on other serves and it works great.
